page.title: 11Religion in East Dean
page.content:
All Saints Church, East Dean, no longer has its own parish priest, but now comes under the care of the Rector of Singleton. A service is held in the church every Sunday, with a family service every month when the children are encouraged to bring their musical intruments, which makes the service a very happy occasion.
East Dean Free Church also has a good following of local people, Sunday school is held at this church and a sunshine hour on Tuesday, both are well attended. A women's section also meets each week.
